Class CLIView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.View
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.CLIView
public class CLIView
extends View
Class that manages CLI interactions with users

    • selectLeaderCards

      public ClientMessage selectLeaderCards​(java.util.List<LeaderCard> leaderCards)
      Show possible options of leader cards to choose and asks the client to select two of them.
      Specified by:
      selectLeaderCards in class View
      Parameters:
      leaderCards - ArrayList of four leader cards
      Returns:
      a SelectLeaderCards message for the server, containing the indexes of the two selected leader cards

    • selectAction

      public ClientMessage selectAction​(java.lang.String choice, boolean err)
      Actions menu displayed every time a user starts his turn. Before selecting the action to perform, the user can call the "show" command as long as he wants to see the status of personal board, market board and development cards deck. Contains code to perform all action and each if statement returns a ClientMessageType of the respective action.
      Specified by:
      selectAction in class View
      Returns:
      a ClientMessage type corresponding to the action selected

    • storeResources

      public ClientMessage storeResources​(java.util.List<Resource> resources)
      Method invoked by ResourcesToStoreMessage, sent by server at the end of pick resources, containing the resources taken from market.
      Specified by:
      storeResources in class View
      Parameters:
      resources -
      Returns:
      InsertResourcesInWarehouseMessage, containing specified shelf and resources to insert or discard.

    • activateProduction

      public ClientMessage activateProduction()
      Invoked by selectAction method if activate production option has been chosen. Production can be normal or of the personal board.
      Specified by:
      activateProduction in class View
      Returns:
      an ActivateProductionMessage containing slots from which start production and eventually leader resources if a production power leader card has been activated.

    • activatePersonalProduction

      public ClientMessage activatePersonalProduction()
      Specified by:
      activatePersonalProduction in class View

    • showParticipantsNumber

      public void showParticipantsNumber​(java.lang.String s)
      Used to notify users when waiting in waiting room before starting the game. Tells how many other players are waiting with them
      Specified by:
      showParticipantsNumber in class View
      Parameters:

    • buyDVCard

      public ClientMessage buyDVCard​(java.util.ArrayList<DevelopmentCard> devCards, boolean err)
      Specified by:
      buyDVCard in class View

    • waitingRoom

      public ClientMessage waitingRoom()
      this method manage the time that the client will be in the waiting room waiting for other players. It allows the client to type commands on the terminal and to exit the game or to start it at any time.
      Specified by:
      waitingRoom in class View
      Returns:
      A ClientMessage object that will handle the choose of the client. It could be a AskStartGameMessage, a ExitFromGameMessage or a EmptyMessage. The EmptyMessage is returned only when the game was started from another client.

    • endWaitingRoom

      public void endWaitingRoom()
      This method is used from StartGameMessage to end the while(stillWaiting) loop of the method waitingRoom()
      Specified by:
      endWaitingRoom in class View

    • leaderProductionRoutine

      public java.util.List<Resource> leaderProductionRoutine()
      Invoked by activateProduction: returns
      Returns:
      the list of resources freely chose by the user if a production power leader card has been activated. Returns null otherwise
